title: For the worlds pick'em
body: What are the prizes or soemthing? can someone explain to me how this works? this would be really helpful for me cause im so lost about it. thanks!

replies.body:
By participating in the World's Pick 'em, you get a poro summoner icon.
If you acheive at least 34 points from your picks, you acheive a second poro summoner icon.
If your picks are 100% correct, you receive Championship Riven (and Riven if you don't own her).
Yup, this is correct! To add to this, if you own Championship Riven already, you'll be given RP instead.
What if you don't even own riven?
Then you get riven with the skin.
i think summoner icons and if you get 100% accuracy you get championship riven
